item.title: Web701 8
item.description: Web Development 701 ~ Spicy Tech For our third assessment we are to research and implement a technology of our choice. I am calling it spicy technology, since this is going to be tech that I find awesome or spicy. What better technology to choose than what I’ve recently discovered and come to love; docker. If you don’t know of docker, then let me give some background information. “Docker is an open platform for developing, shipping, and running applications.
